title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Russ Cringe + Week 8 ‘Sharp’ or ‘Square’
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Russ Cringe + Week 8 ‘Sharp’ or ‘Square’
description:
First, Colin examines LeBron’s cryptic social media call out of the Lakers, if they’re taking him for granted, and why he’s not bothered by Russell Wilson’s ever present cringe factor.

Then the Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his NFL Week 8 picks are "sharp" or "square". They look at Cardinals/Vikings (15:00), Dolphins/Lions (17:00), Bengals/Browns (19:00), Broncos/Jags (21:00), Patriots/Jets (23:00), Packers/Bills (24:00), Raiders/Saints (28:00), Commanders/Colts (29:00).

Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd #volume

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
